text.__SUMMARY__: Geum coccineum, common name dwarf orange avens or red avens, is a plant in the rose family, Rosaceae.
text.Description: Geum coccineum has low mound of leaves and bright orange flowers blooming in late spring and summer.
text.Distribution:
This species is native to parts of Western Asia (Turkey) and in Southeastern Europe (Albania; Bosnia and Herzegovina; Bulgaria; Greece; Macedonia; Montenegro; Serbia).
